name: Nugget Casino Resort
description: For more than 60 years the Nugget Casino Resort has been an iconic destination in Reno-Sparks. 1,380 guest rooms in twin 28-story towers, five restaurants, 110,000 sq ft of meeting space, year-round atrium pool, and three live entertainment venues.
shortDescription: Iconic Reno-Sparks resort with 1,380 rooms in twin towers, 8,500-seat event center, and 5 restaurants.

roomTypes.name: Standard Room
roomTypes.description: Fully renovated rooms with modern amenities.

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Room
roomTypes.description: Upgraded rooms in the twin towers.

roomTypes.name: Suite
roomTypes.description: Spacious suites with separate living area.

faqs.question: Where is Nugget Casino Resort?
faqs.answer: 1100 Nugget Ave in Sparks, NV — minutes from downtown Reno.

faqs.question: Does Nugget offer golf packages?
faqs.answer: Yes — Golf the High Sierra creates custom packages. Groups save up to 20%.
